title: Bug 4971: Unusual behavior during 'copy package'
description:
Bug 4971: Unusual behavior during 'copy package' in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui.

Steps:
1. Open org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui.
2. Select 'xxx' as destination.

Observed Behavior:
After completing the 'copy package' operation, package 'ui' is duplicated in the destination folder 'xx'.

Expected Behavior:
After completing the 'copy package' operation, the package 'ui' should not be duplicated in the destination folder 'xx'.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui.
2. Select 'xxx' as destination.
3. Perform the 'copy package' operation.

Note: Please provide any additional relevant information if available.
